title: Volume Converter
description: Convert between different volume and liquid measurement units

sections.title: About Volume Conversion
content: Volume conversion is essential for cooking, chemistry, fuel calculations, and liquid measurements across different systems.

sections.title: Common Volume Units
content: US Customary: Fluid Ounce, Cup, Pint, Quart, Gallon
Imperial: Imperial Gallon (larger than US gallon)

sections.title: Use Cases
content: Swimming pool and tank capacity calculations
